metadata.Title: CVE-2022-45888 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 6.0.9.drivers/char/xillybus/xillyusb.c has a race condition and use-after-freeduring physical removal of a USB device.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
